rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"$G.ess=true and nullsub($G.src,false)~=true"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Auto fill ESS (when ( Expression: $G.ess=true and nullsub($G.src,false)~=true))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var attachments = vars.$L_file.getAttachments();\u000avar attLen = 0;\u000afor (var i = 0; i < attachments.length; i++) {\u000a\u0009if (lib.IDOL_Utilities.isImage(attachments[i])){\u000a\u0009\u0009attLen++;\u000a\u0009}\u000a}\u000a\u000a/** copy mandant value from operator to current $L.file -- test purpose*/\u000alib.IDOL_Help.checkValue(record)\u000arecord.doSave()\u000a/** copy mandant value from operator to current $L.file */\u000a\u000a//call auto categorization\u000aif (vars['$G.ess'] && vars['$lo.idol.enabled'] && attLen === 0)\u000a{ \u000a /**\u000a\u0009var company = \"\";\u000a\u0009if (vars['$G.multi'])\u000a\u0009{\u000a\u0009\u0009company = vars['$lo.operator']['company'];\u000a\u0009}*/\u000a var company = [];\u000a company = lib.SmartTicketMandantTools.getCurrentUserMandantValue();\u000a\u0009lib.IDOL_Utilities.fillIncidentsByIdol(vars.$L_file, 3, company);\u000a}"}
